mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO log(
msg_id,
msg_content,
operator_name,
operator_id,
oper_object,
module_name,
time,
ip,
client_type,
mobile_version,
operator_obj_id,
operator_obj_name,
operator_obj_code,
type,
platform_id,
) VALUES (
#{msgId},
#{msgContent},
#{operatorName},
#{operatorId},
#{operObject},
#{moduleName},
#{time},
#{ip},
#{clientType},
#{mobileVersion},
#{operatorObjId},
#{operatorObjName},
#{operatorObjCode},
#{type},
#{platformId},
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE log
msg_id = #{msgId},
msg_content = #{msgContent},
operator_name = #{operatorName},
operator_id = #{operatorId},
oper_object = #{operObject},
module_name = #{moduleName},
time = #{time},
ip = #{ip},
client_type = #{clientType},
mobile_version = #{mobileVersion},
operator_obj_id = #{operatorObjId},
operator_obj_name = #{operatorObjName},
operator_obj_code = #{operatorObjCode},
type = #{type},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
